title: DHC Japan Briller Crystal White Placenta & L-cystine Beauty Diet Supplement (60 chewable tablets/15 Days)
description: This beauty diet supplement contains placenta extract, L-cystine for improving skin translucency, increasing skin firmness, luster, and clarity. It also blended with vitamin C, cysteine-containing yeast, silk powder, and bird nest powder extract for improving skin smoothness, and avoid damage from UV rays.Made in JapanSuggested Dosage:4 table
cleaned_text: This beauty diet supplement contains placenta extract, L-cystine for improving skin translucency, increasing skin firmness, luster, and clarity. It also blended with vitamin C, cysteine-containing yeast, silk powder, and bird nest powder extract for improving skin smoothness, and avoid damage from UV rays. Made in Japan Suggested Dosage: 4 tablets everyday. DO NOT overdose. Precaution: 1. Stop use and ask a doctor if an allergic reaction to this product occurs. 2. For patient with chronicle disease, or pregnancy, consult doctor before consumption. 3. Seal after use. 4. Keep in cool area and avoid direct sunlight. 5. Keep away from children. 6. As this product is extracted from natural ingredients, it is normal if there is a color difference between the shown photo.
